column5: how do u guys mount the sonar on your canoe if anyone does on here??? I mounted mind last year and never got it quite right cause as i gained speed it would move. so was just wondering how the pros do it  i remember seeing a pic one nicely done in a magazine not looking to buy a 200$ humming bird mount
what would move the unit or the transducer would move
sorry the transducer would move once i start to paddle and
